options.heywiki.title: Hey Wiki Options
options.heywiki.requires_confirmation.de: Open confirmation screen before opening the wiki article. This is useful to avoid accidentally triggering the feature.
options.heywiki.language.name: Wiki language
options.heywiki.language.description: Set your preferred language, overriding game language setting.
options.heywiki.open_keybinds.name: Go to keybinds settings
options.heywiki.open_keybinds.descriptio: Open the keybinds settings page to configure Hey Wiki's keybinds.
